evidence.text: Person B: Theaters, synagogues- Restorations. Some, quite unusual.

Person A: Where is it you come from, if you don't mind my asking? I can't place the accent.
Person A: Ravaged during the war- just terrible.
Person B: He is gone, but everyone is still frightened that people like me are a threat to your national defense-

Person B: I can feel you nearer to me now than ever before.
Person B: Your love, Laszlo
